Pre-Game Insights: The Rohit Sharma-led India will be up against the Aiden Markram-led South Africa, and the title will be up for grabs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The weather in Barbados is expected to be cloudy and windy with a thunderstorm in parts of the area.
Over 50% of rainfall is expected to happen in the Barbados area.
Rain will be a trouble for both teams in terms of their practice and the pitch could see significant changes due to the dampness.
